rules.name: Redline2totrue
rules.conditionLogic: ( 1 AND 2 AND 3 ) OR ( Not(1) AND 2 AND 3 AND ( 4 OR 5 ) )
rules.label: Yes

decisions.name: Is_Ethernet_or_Cloud_IT_Selected
decisions.label: Is Ethernet or Cloud IT Selected?

rules.name: IsOrderNotNull
rules.conditionLogic: ( 1 AND 2 AND 4) OR ( NOT ( 1 ) AND 2 AND 3 AND 4)
rules.label: Yes

rules.name: OpportunityAuditIsFailed
rules.conditionLogic: ( 1 AND ( 2 OR 3 ) ) OR ( NOT(1) AND (2 OR 3) AND 4 AND 5 )
rules.label: Yes

formulas.name: varForGreggWells
formulas.expression: ({!varCreatedByProfileName} = 'Partner Support Team' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#CTF Small Business User' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#Alternate Channel Manager' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#Alternate Channel Leadership' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#CTF Customer Service Analyst') && (ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Connecticut') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Delaware') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Indiana') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Massachusetts') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Maryland') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Maine') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New Hampshire') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New Jersey') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New York') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Ohio') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Pennsylvania') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Rhode Island') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Virginia') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Vermont'))

formulas.name: varForJayBass
formulas.expression: ({!varCreatedByProfileName} = 'Partner Support Team' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#CTF Small Business User' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#Alternate Channel Manager' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#Alternate Channel Leadership' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#CTF Customer Service Analyst') && (ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Florida') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Georgia') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'North Carolina') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'South Carolina') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Tennessee') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'West Virginia'))

formulas.name: varForMarcyLimatola
formulas.expression: ({!varCreatedByProfileName} = 'Partner Support Team' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#CTF Small Business User' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#Alternate Channel Manager' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#Alternate Channel Leadership' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#CTF Customer Service Analyst') && (ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Alaska') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Colorado') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Kansas') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Missouri') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'North Dakota') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'South Dakota') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Utah') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Wyoming') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'California') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Arizona') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Iowa') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Nebraska') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Nevada'))

formulas.name: varForThomasJeffries
formulas.expression: ({!varCreatedByProfileName} = 'Partner Support Team' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#CTF Small Business User' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#Alternate Channel Manager' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#Alternate Channel Leadership' || {!varCreatedByProfileName} = '#CTF Customer Service Analyst') && (ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Alabama') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Arkansas') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Illinois') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Kentucky') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Louisiana') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Michigan') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Mississippi') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New Mexico') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Oklahoma') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Wisconsin') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Minnesota') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Texas'))

formulas.name: varPortalGreggWells
formulas.expression: ({!varCreatedByProfileName} = 'Frontier Partner Portal User' && {!$Record.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Partner_Opportunity_New'}) && (ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Connecticut') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Delaware') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Indiana') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Massachusetts') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Maryland') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Maine') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New Hampshire') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New Jersey') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New York') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Ohio') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Pennsylvania') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Rhode Island') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Virginia') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Vermont'))

formulas.name: varPortalJayBass
formulas.expression: ({!varCreatedByProfileName} = 'Frontier Partner Portal User' && {!$Record.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Partner_Opportunity_New'}) && (ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Florida') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Georgia') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'North Carolina') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'South Carolina') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Tennessee') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'West Virginia'))

value.stringValue: Teaming opportunity requires leader approval prior to closing.

textTemplates.name: SendEmailforOpportunityApproval
textTemplates.text:
{!$Record.Owner.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner.LastName} has submitted the following opportunity for review: {!$Record.Name}

Please approve or reject the opportunity using the link below or by going to your Home Page and the Items to Approve section in Salesforce.


URL: {!RecordURL}


Thank you!
